cast.overview: After Santa Claus (codename: Red One) is kidnapped, the North Pole's Head of Security must team up with the world's most infamous tracker in a globe-trotting, action-packed mission to save Christmas.
cast.title: Red One

details.biography: Kiernan Brennan Shipka (born November 10, 1999) is an American actress. As a child actress, she had early appearances in small roles on television shows such as Monk (2006) and Heroes (2007). Shikpa's breakthrough and most widely-known role is as Sally Draper in Mad Men (2007 - 2015). She also had starring television roles as the voice of Jinora in The Legend of Korra (2012 - 2014), and Sabrina Spellman in Chilling Adventures of Sabrina (2018 - 2020) and Riverdale (2021 - 2022). She has starred in films including The Blackcoat’s Daughter (2015), Wildflower (2022), and Totally Killer (2023), followed by Twisters, Longlegs, Red One, Sweethearts, and The Last Showgirl (all in 2024).
details.name: Kiernan Shipka
